title: Code Vision
shortDescription: VS Code extension for blind programmers to navigate code using keyboard.
impact: Improved code accessibility for visually impaired users.
details: Parses entire folder structure and provides key-based navigation. Identifies Python constructs like classes, functions, variables, and loops. Also reports syntax errors via audio feedback.

title: Meet Your Dronacharya
shortDescription: Career guidance platform built using MERN stack.
impact: Helped students find relevant career advice and resources.
details: Connects users with experts for career conversations. Includes chat, login/signup with Google, spam detection, and exam resources.

title: Helping Nemo
shortDescription: Unity-based game to spread awareness about water pollution.
impact: Educated users about water pollution through interactive gameplay.
details: Player controls a ship to clean garbage, rescue animals, and collect oil spills. Features both Survival and Story modes.

title: UwU Compiler
shortDescription: Compiler built from scratch using Lex and Yacc.
impact: Built a working compiler with full semantic and intermediate code generation.
details: Implements lexical, syntax, and semantic analysis with symbol tables, IR code, TAC optimization, and pre-processing.

title: Histainability
shortDescription: Android app to educate students about SDGs using history and quizzes.
impact: Shortlisted in Hack of PI Hackathon by PAN IIT.
details: Uses Google N-Grams to track SDG discussion trends over time. Includes quizzes and learning modules for students.

title: Bytify
shortDescription: Python simulator for MIPS architecture with visual pipeline analysis.
impact: Helps students understand MIPS pipeline and caching visually.
details: Supports editing, testing MIPS code, and provides cache/pipeline diagrams for better understanding.

title: Hostel Seva
shortDescription: Web app for hostel food ordering and complaint management.
impact: Streamlined food ordering and issue tracking for hostel residents.
details: Allows users to place orders, file complaints, and authenticate securely using MERN stack.

title: Soil Informer
shortDescription: Web tool to help farmers analyze soil conditions with visual aids.
impact: Helped farmers understand soil health with gamified tools.
details: Provides soil insights using educational games, memes, and blog articles to make the experience interactive.
